items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [kerneldiego (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/KernelDiego/kerneldiego-zsh-theme) - A minimal and informative Zsh theme with a clean box-style layout, Git integration, and colorful prompt indicators for productivity and visual clarity.

items.title: Awesome Typescript
items.content_text:
### Offline / Other (Plugins || Cross-platform || OSS || Free)

*   [Coc (‚≠ê25k)](https://github.com/neoclide/coc.nvim) Make your Vim/Neovim as smart as VSCode.

### Web / Playground

*   :octocat: [ILLA Cloud](https://www.illacloud.com/) - Open source low-code platform alternative to Retool and Appsmith for developers to build internal tools in minutes.

### AI / Playground

*   :octocat: [MastraAI (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/mastra-ai/mastra) - Mastra is an opinionated TypeScript framework that helps you build AI applications and features quickly.

### Acknowledgements / Chrome Extensions

*   2023 - ‚öí Thank you Hamza ( @Hamza12700 <https://github.com/Hamza12700> ) for [more than 15 merged pull requests (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/dzharii/awesome-typescript/pulls?q=is%3Apr+author%3AHamza12700+is%3Aclosed). Great contribution to keeping this list up-to-date with modern TypeScript projects. **Contributor of the year 2023**.
items.content_html:

Web / Playground

  • üêô ILLA Cloud - Open source low-code platform alternative to Retool and Appsmith for developers to build internal tools in minutes.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Bookmarks and Link Sharing

*   [Karakeep](https://karakeep.app/) - Bookmark-everything app with a touch of AI for the data hoarders out there. ([Demo](https://try.karakeep.app/signin), [Source Code (‚≠ê18k)](https://github.com/karakeep-app/karakeep)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Communication - Email - Mail Delivery Agents

*   [DavMail](https://davmail.sourceforge.net/) `‚ö†` - POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav/Carddav/LDAP exchange gateway allowing users to use any mail/calendar client with an Exchange server, even from the internet or behind a firewall through Outlook Web Access. ([Source Code (‚≠ê638)](https://github.com/mguessan/davmail)) `GPL-2.0` `Java`

### Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

*   [ExpenseOwl (‚≠ê987)](https://github.com/tanq16/expenseowl) - Extremely simple expense tracker with a beautiful UI. `MIT` `Go/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Note-taking & Editors

*   [Blinko](https://blinko.space/) - A personal note tool with AI features. ([Source Code (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/blinko-space/blinko)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Pastebins

*   [Local Content Share (‚≠ê297)](https://github.com/Tanq16/local-content-share) - Store and share text snippets and files within your local network. `MIT` `Docker/Go`

### Software / Software Development - Feature Toggle

*   [Featbit](https://www.featbit.co/) - Enterprise-grade feature flag platform that you can self-host. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/featbit/featbit)) `MIT` `Docker/K8S`
items.content_html:
Software / Bookmarks and Link Sharing

  • Karakeep - Bookmark-everything app with a touch of AI for the data hoarders out there. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê18k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Communication - Email - Mail Delivery Agents

  • DavMail ‚ö† - POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav/Carddav/LDAP exchange gateway allowing users to use any mail/calendar client with an Exchange server, even from the internet or behind a firewall through Outlook Web Access. (Source Code (‚≠ê638)) GPL-2.0 Java

Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

  • ExpenseOwl (‚≠ê987) - Extremely simple expense tracker with a beautiful UI. MIT Go/Docker/K8S

Software / Note-taking & Editors

  • Blinko - A personal note tool with AI features. (Source Code (‚≠ê4.9k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Pastebins

  • Local Content Share (‚≠ê297) - Store and share text snippets and files within your local network. MIT Docker/Go

Software / Software Development - Feature Toggle

  • Featbit - Enterprise-grade feature flag platform that you can self-host. (Source Code (‚≠ê1.6k)) MIT Docker/K8S

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Speciality Search Engines

*   [GrayhatWarfare](https://grayhatwarfare.com/) - Searches and indexes open Amazon S3 buckets, allowing users to find and explore potentially exposed data.
*   [Harmari (Unified Listings Search)](https://www.harmari.com/search/unified)
*   [Intelligence X](https://intelx.io/tools) - Paid OSINT Tool Allowing users to search for information across various sources including the dark web and public data leaks.
*   [ODIN](https://search.odin.io/) - Used to search for Hosts, CVEs & Exposed Buckets/Files and shows a website is vulnerable or not. 10 Free Searches Per Day.
items.content_html:
Speciality Search Engines

  • GrayhatWarfare - Searches and indexes open Amazon S3 buckets, allowing users to find and explore potentially exposed data.
  • Harmari (Unified Listings Search)
  • Intelligence X - Paid OSINT Tool Allowing users to search for information across various sources including the dark web and public data leaks.
  • ODIN - Used to search for Hosts, CVEs & Exposed Buckets/Files and shows a website is vulnerable or not. 10 Free Searches Per Day.
